mapper.insert: insert into board ( bo_ctg, bo_writer, bo_title, bo_pinned, bo_replyable, bo_writing, expose_start, expose_end, content, reg_date, hit_cnt, bo_enabled, bo_thumbnail ) values ( #{boCtg}, #{boWriter}, #{boTitle}, #{boPinned}, #{boReplyable}, #{boWriting}, #{exposeStart}, #{exposeEnd}, #{content}, now(), #{hitCnt}, 1, #{boThumbnail} )
insert into board_attach ( bo_id, attach_url, attach_o_name, attach_type ) values ( #{boId}, #{attachUrl}, #{attachOName}, #{attachType} )
